item.title: Videographer To Film Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking to hire a videographer with or without experience in the US to film social media content

You must own a car or a bike to drive around the city

You must own you own gear and equipment like Camera, Lenses, Tripod, Microphone and Batteries

You will work 2 days a week per client, 3 hours each day

I will pay you $30usd an hour

And you will have 6 clients under your command

That means that when you get to the point where you have the 6 clients under your command, you'll be making $4,320/mo

In 6 months if you do your job properly, you can be eligible for a raise

That means you will go from $4,320/mo to $6,000/mo

We are going to be working initially with Kitchens Remodeling Companies, Bathroom Remodeling Companies and Construction Companies    

Your job is to go to the place they're working and in the first 2 hours you and the client are going to film the "A-Roll" of the videos.

You have to film 50 clips for B-roll. 5 seconds each.

And the B-Roll you film must include camera movement

For example

Tracking
Lets say shots going from right to left
Following the workers doing the job over there

And 2 or 3 styles more, Pretty easy

If you don't have experience, the minimum knowledge that you must have to qualify for this application is:

Know how a camera works  
Know how to shoot videos in a camera
Know how to do camera movements
And have a car or bike to drive or ride around the city

Budget: $4,320
